about_the_game:
Vox Siege is a an Action-RPG Tower Defence game. Where you need to help Vox save the their country Fiora from the dark portals that have spawn across the land. Choose your hero, level up and grow stronger with new towers unlocked along the way and with your hero abilities take your stand beside Vox to close the portals and save the land. Do you have what it takes to build up a defence and help reclaim the land?

Features

Player:
  • Create a hero
  • level up to unlock new towers
  • Come up with a strategies to defend against the waves of monster approaching you

Different typ of game modes:
  • Classic mode: built / combat phases
  • Portal destroy: No time to rest, the enemies will continuously approaching until you destroy the spawn portals
  • Time waves: Survive against waves under time pressure.
